description: [Tier 2] Analysts raise price targets following strong earnings and revenue growth, driven by Services and resilient cash flow. (Annualized Imp. Ret: 12.83%)
[Tier 2] DA Davidson downgraded Amazon due to increased AI investment and a softer operating margin outlook. (Annualized Imp. Ret: 20.11%)
[Tier 2] Strong fourth-quarter earnings, with sales growing 24% to USD 60 billion, and investments in artificial intelligence driving engagement and ad efficacy. (Annualized Imp. Ret: 28.44%)
[Tier 2] Upcoming earnings report on Feb. 25 and potential for Blackwell-powered large language models to drive stock. (Annualized Imp. Ret: 55.71%)
